p: After 16 h of fasting, the animals were weighed and slaughtered. During the slaughtering procedure, the animals were stunned by electronarcosis (220 V, 1.5 A for 10 seconds; Dal Pino, Santo André, SP, Brazil). Then, the carcasses were suspended and bled from the jugular vein and carotid artery before they were skinned and eviscerated according to the guidelines of the Brazilian Department of Agriculture and Livestock (n°03 Rules/00 Brazil) for the Federal Inspection Service (SIF).
